Welcome!

Thanks for using BusTO, an indipendent app useful to move around Torino using a Free/Libre and Open Source software.

Why using this app?

- You\'ll never be tracked
- You\'ll never see boring ads
- We\'ll always respect your privacy
- Moreover, it\'s lightweight!

How does it work?

This app will show you the timetable of the buses using the information published on the site http://www.5t.torino.it.
